AirTravelEmssnFctr.name: AirTravelEmssnFctr
AirTravelEmssnFctr.description: Represents the emissions factors for scope 3 commercial air travel.

Ch4PsgrKmLongHaulInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per passenger-kilometer in CO2e from long-haul flights.

Ch4PsgrKmMediumHaulInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per passenger-kilometer in CO2e from medium-haul flights.

Ch4PsgrKmShortHaulInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per passenger-kilometer in CO2e from short-haul flights.

Ch4PsgrMileLongHaulInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per passenger-mile in CO2e from long-haul flights.

Ch4PsgrMileMediumHaulInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per passenger-mile in CO2e from medium-haul flights.

Ch4PsgrMileShortHaulInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per passenger-mile in CO2e from short-haul flights.

Co2PsgrKmLongHaulInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per passenger-kilometer from long-haul flights.

Co2PsgrKmMediumHaulInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per passenger-kilometer from medium-haul flights.

Co2PsgrKmShortHaulInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per passenger-kilometer from short-haul flights.

Co2PsgrMileLongHaulInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per passenger-mile from long-haul flights.

Co2PsgrMileMediumHaulInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per passenger-mile from medium-haul flights.

Co2PsgrMileShortHaulInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per passenger-mile from short-haul flights.

DistanceUnit.description: The unit of measure for the distance.

EmissionFactorDataSource.description: The source of the emissions factor reference data.

EmissionFactorUpdateYear.description: The year in which this reference data for the emissions factor was most recently updated.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the emissions factor.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LongHaulMinimumDistance.description: The minimum distance for a long-haul flight thatâ€™s adjusted according to the short-haul or medium-haul distances.

MediumHaulMaximumDistance.description: The maximum distance of a medium-haul flight.

N2oPsgrKmLongHaulInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per passenger-kilometer in CO2e from long-haul flights.

N2oPsgrKmMediumHaulInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per passenger-kilometer in CO2e from medium-haul flights.

N2oPsgrKmShortHaulInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per passenger-kilometer in CO2e from short-haul flights.

N2oPsgrMileLongHaulInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per passenger-mile in CO2e from long-haul flights.

N2oPsgrMileMediumHaulInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per passenger-mile in CO2e from medium-haul flights.

N2oPsgrMileShortHaulInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per passenger-mile in CO2e from short-haul flights.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

ShortHaulMaximumDistance.description: The maximum distance of a short-haul flight.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.
